Name: Lemon Meringue Martini
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Slightly creamy consistency, this tangy lemon drink is indeed reminiscent of the eponymous dessert.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2000 by Ben Reed, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Lemon Meringue Martini contains 227 calories
